title: Nathalie Colin unveils exquisite Diwali installations by Swarovski India in Mumbai
text:
In anticipation of the upcoming festival of lights, last weekend witnessed the launch of one of the most exquisite Diwali installations of the season, Light Up Your Life, by Swarovski India at an exquisite cocktail party in the city.
The installation was unveiled by Nathalie Colin (Creative Director and Executive Vice President, Consumer Goods Business, Swarovski Group) in the presence of Francis Belin (Senior VP , Swarovski Consumer Goods Business Asia-Pacific), Sukanya Dutta Roy (MD, Swarovski Consumer Goods Business India) and Atul Ruia (MD, The Phoenix Mills Limited).
Inspired by lanterns, this installation has been conceptualised by artist-designer and scenographer, Sumant Jayakrishnan.Keeping in line with Swarovski's strong presence in India since 2000 (the brand has 40 boutiques in over 19 Indian cities), Nathalie has designed an exclusive India collection inspired by the rich heritage of art and design, especially elements from historical landmarks. The collection takes inspiration from India's resplendent architecture, which is famously seen in the Taj Mahal. Arches, domes and elaborate stone inlay patterns find their way into this exclusive jewellery collection.
"I have a passion for jewellery and jewellery styling! It's a real energy boost to select and mix jewellery pieces every morning for the look of the day and its different situations -work meetings, lunch with friends, a fashion event, a formal dinner. I want to share this passion and help consumers feel comfortable and confident about styling jewellery that fits the season's trends and each woman's style," said Nathalie.
